ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Hunting? We hunted down almost everyone already, but sure, we ll come. Inzola said. Good to practice with our new beast modes. Deemos said. He patted Wrath

"Hunting? We hunted down almost everyone already, but sure, we'll come." In=
zola said.

"Good to practice with our new beast modes." Deemos said. He pa=
tted Wrath on the shoulder.

"Those Alliance and Preds will be sorry they w=
ouldn't let us join!" Deemos said. Inzola looked at Wrath.

"The Maximals, =
most of them just don't got it, but a few stand out, you are one of those f=
ew." Inzola said to Wrath...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: ilovea=
lllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 2:40 A=
M
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  *Wrath smiles* Wrath: Well......We can =
go scouting...hmm....I've haven't had much to do...We go hunting? *Wrath as=
ks Deemos and Inzola*
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
=
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 2:13 AM
    S=
ubject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    Inzola smiles and shakes Wrath's hand.

  =
  "Nice to meet such a charming and powerful bot upon my repair." Inzola sa=
id. Deemos and Inzola hugged for about 5 seconds and then looked back to Wr=
ath.

    "So, what are we supposed to do right now?" Deemos asked Wrath...=

      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: ilovealllizards 
      To:=
 nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 12:53 AM
      Sub=
ject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      Wrath: I am Wrath and you must be the Inzo=
la that Deemos spoke about. A pleasure to meet you. *Wrath extends his hand=
 for a hand shake*
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: THEC=
ODE 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 =
12:20 AM
        Subject: Neo Beast Wars


        Deemos looked at the CR =
Chamber when it beeped. Inzola came out and looked around.

        "Maxima=
l base, it's crude but it'll do." Inzola said. Deemos laughed.

        "Wh=
o are you?" Inzola asked Wrath.

        Gangon's spark is still waiting.

=
        Artist runs around in a circle, playing his stupid games he believe=
d exercises him. He runs away from the Maximal base and to a mountain. He r=
uns into the mountain and an avalanche starts, Artist is burried, various t=
houghts pass through his mind. Hours later, he awakes.

        "Oh, that w=
as some blow, but I'll go with the flow." Artist said.

        "Plintissa?=
 Where are you my love? Come on out, Turtle Dove!" Artist called out. He re=
membered that she was in the desert. His comm unit and compass were working=
, so he ran to Plintissa. Plintissa looked up at him coldly.

        "Plin=
tissa dear? You don't remember me? For me death was near." Artist said. Pli=
ntissa looked up in shock and flew into Artist's arms. Artist laughed and t=
hey kissed. After the kiss.

        "Do me a favor, Artist, stop using rhy=
mes." Plintissa said. She kissed him.

        "Okay, I won't rhyme, we'll =
have a good time! Oops!" Artist said. They both laughed and Artist took Pli=
ntissa to a grassy plain.

        Dracona held up her scanning device in f=
ront of Scorponok's face.

        "I can find that device I lost." Dracona=
 said.

        "Then I'll give it to the Predacons, it's a piece of my bla=
ster, it is an ice gun." Dracona said. She looked at Scorponok with big bea=
utiful eyes. Sinister and Sinesis stared at her, mouths agape.

        The=
 Radicons sat there still...
